summary: POWER STEERING FAILED WHILE DRIVING NEW FORD FOCUS SE, MAKING IT DIFFICULT TO STEER THE CAR. I SEE THERE ARE MANY COMPLAINTS ABOUT THIS BUT NO SOLUTIONS. WILL THERE BE A RECALL ISSUED BEFORE THIS HAPPENS TO SOMEONE AT SPEED AND CAUSES A WRECK RESULTING IN INJURY OR DEATH?  *TR
